title: Erosu purasu gyakusatsu
actors: Mariko Okada, Toshiyuki Hosokawa, Yûko Kusunoki, Kazuko Inano, Etsushi Takahashi, Daijirô Harada, Toshiko Ii, Yoshihide Gotô, Toshiko Inoue, Kikuo Kaneuchi, Kyûzô Kawabe, Katsuya Kobayashi, Kazuko Kui, Kinji Matsueda, Kazunori Miyazaki
description: Two interwoven stories. The first is a biography of anarchist Sakae Osugi which follows his relationship with three women in the 1920s. The second centers around two 1960s' students researching Osugi's theories.

title: La nuova terra
actors: Max von Sydow, Liv Ullmann, Eddie Axberg, Pierre Lindstedt, Allan Edwall, Monica Zetterlund, Hans Alfredson, Agneta Prytz, Halvar Björk, Tom C. Fouts, Peter Lindgren, Per Oscarsson, Oscar Ljung, Karin Nordström, Larry Clementson
description: A Swedish immigrant family struggle to establish a new life for themselves in the forest of Minnesota in the mid 19th Century.

title: Il padrino - Parte II
actors: Al Pacino, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Robert De Niro, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Lee Strasberg, Michael V. Gazzo, G.D. Spradlin, Richard Bright, Gastone Moschin, Tom Rosqui, Bruno Kirby, Frank Sivero, Francesca De Sapio
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: Malcolm X
actors: Denzel Washington, Angela Bassett, Albert Hall, Al Freeman Jr., Delroy Lindo, Spike Lee, Theresa Randle, Kate Vernon, Lonette McKee, Tommy Hollis, James McDaniel, Ernest Thomas, Jean-Claude La Marre, O.L. Duke, Larry McCoy
description: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

title: Lajja
actors: Manisha Koirala, Jackie Shroff, Madhuri Dixit, Ajay Devgn, Rekha, Anil Kapoor, Mahima Chaudhry, Danny Denzongpa, Suresh Oberoi, Gulshan Grover, Tinnu Anand, Sharman Joshi, Govind Namdeo, Anjan Srivastav, Farida Jalal
description: The lives of four women from different places are the victims of male chauvinism and marital abuse. They decide to fight for their rights and dignity against the social norms and injustice.

title: Shizumanu taiyô
actors: Ken Watanabe, Erika Toda, Shun Sugata, Ren Osugi, Yasuko Matsuyuki, Fumiyo Kohinata, Teruyuki Kagawa, Tomokazu Miura, Takashi Kashiwabara, Tôru Kazama, Ken Utsui, Misa Shimizu, Shigeru Kôyama, Tae Kimura, Masahiko Nishimura
description: A drama based on the 1985 plane crash that caused 520 deaths, the worst aviation event in Japanese history.
